title: This is a delightfully maintained three-bedroom, one office, 2.5 bath
posting_body: This is a delightfully maintained three-bedroom, one office, 2.5 bath 1750 sqft house, with a modern custom kitchen with professional range and oven, teak countertop, maple butcher block food prep area, beautiful Japanese style enclosed front and back areas with a fire pit, Indonesian sandstone water fountain, and places for quiet contemplation, relaxation and entertaining.
Three massive redwoods in back yard.
Brand new washer and dryer inside the house.
TEXT AT:- (850) 366-68_58   FOR MORE INQUIRY (PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR E-MAIL AND THE HOUSE ADDRESS YOU INQUIRE FOR THE BEST RESPONSE).
